About Me

~ 我的简历 | My CV~

小本职 · Expertise

香港中文大学地理资源管理系
地理信息科学专业理学硕士在读
MSc. student in Department of Geography and Resource Management, The Chinese University of Hong Kong. Major is GeoInformation Science.

小闲情 · Hobbies

喜欢写点东西，偶尔涂鸦作文，
近来在制作独立游戏
Enjoy writing. Write novels or draw pictures from time to time. Mow I am making an independent game.

小玩乐 · Joy

爱好摄影、旅行、动漫,
最近在玩棒球
Interst in photography and ACG. Enjoy going trip and playing baseball.
